b0493771961c1fd89c96271b397da62699877551.commitMessage: Issue #5008: increase coverage of pitest-checks-coding to 97%

40a0b5dcf7f9b45ae98ddcb1dec6e9e7c4eec676.commitMessage: Issue #3239: fixed checks that fail on new receiver parameter (#3272)

dba6c944cdbf9acfbb40b9a2d8e6315fb14d87f0.commitMessage: Issue #382: Fix HiddenField false positive violations for anonymous classes

cc7aeaec906dc3c864477e3050510009b2a946ee.commitMessage:
Fix some typos in coding package. #1555

Fixes some `SpellCheckingInspection` inspection violations.

Description:
>Spellchecker inspection helps locate typos and misspelling in your code, comments and literals.

4d2e6647f9e8385749c382bcab5e64965a943178.commitMessage:
Rename boolean methods to start with question word. #1555

Fixes `BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports boolean methods whose names do not start with a question word. Boolean methods that override library methods are ignored by this inspection.

a265fee823c473d632b83c446b2e6bc82960b2c0.commitMessage: HiddenFieldCheck updated to follow Cyclomatic Complexity rule. #954

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

6784e5bcd5baa6b5086bf8b63709856d685a74c8.commitMessage: HiddenField module can now accept setterCanReturnItsClass attribute. #598

9f39a76cd595caf08597b89c9122e2cbb5ff8684.commitMessage:
Fix for 1084512 (Parameters of abstract methods hide fields)
  Added ignoreAbstractMethods property to allow configure HiddenField
  check to ignore params of abstract methods.

Now test inputs (almost all) will be compiled as part of
run.test.suite and run.tests targets (this compilation requires
jdk1.5 or higher)

e27489c7721909245ea5055eac3b9c7c659081f6.commitMessage: initial replacing RE by Pattern (need to update docs)

84d33e55d9735a79f1e0e9f692dd92592aa2f055.commitMessage:
Fixed HiddenFieldCheck error for a local variable of a static
method with same name as an instance field(bug 827713)

a00160b33c89916e57bf80a6256e4944407b4de4.commitMessage: Added property to HiddenFieldCheck to ignore constructor parameters (request 798240).

dc3fc5fab0cb1cadd5793065d8e44bbd2c5f67e2.commitMessage:
Added property to HiddenFieldCheck to ignore the parameter of
property setter methods (request 790456).

4981978ee20649f39244d3f2003580dad28770eb.commitMessage:
Corrected bug 747530, inner class fields interpreted as local variables.
Incorporated catch parameters as local variables.

4d307934ff226b8b1fd79005496b5f4eb832a68d.commitMessage: Made check independent of order of declarations.

0b38b65f919bd7b3d8a440c459ce754a4a840b03.commitMessage:
strengthened to also check  fields of outer classes, and to check
parameters by default.
improved code coverage.

d2a0e41072c8a97195971566c571ef84c7593627.commitMessage: fixed bug in checking an interface.

74989ba01127916157571418f5a7ad16929fcda5.commitMessage:
Checks whether a local variable or parameter shadows a field.
This is the cause for one of the most common logic errors of beginners.
